instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the custom colors (surgical-teal, instrument-slate) and fonts.
3. FONTS: Import 'Manrope', 'Inter', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in 'index.css'.
4. LAYOUT: Implement the Landing Page as a full-screen split layout. The 'Children' side should be visually disabled/muted.
5. CALCULATOR: Build the calculator as a single view. Use 'useState' for all inputs. Calculations must happen in real-time (useEffect or derived state).
6. LOGIC: TFI (Total Fluid Intake) is the base. Deduct Feeds and TPN from it to get the IV Fluid rate.
7. NACL LOGIC: If 3% NaCl is checked, ask for amount (ml/kg/day) and deduct that volume as well.
8. FLUID TYPE: If 'D10% + D50%' is selected, show the mixing ratio calculation.
9. DARK MODE: Implement a toggle in the top-right corner that switches the 'dark' class on the HTML element.
10. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all inputs have associated labels. Use 'aria-live' for the result region.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Do not center-align the main app container.
